ai-ja283:1.2_0: in a place where the pigs of sal trees.
ai-ja283:1.3_0: But now I meditate alone and practices absorption,
ai-ja283:1.4_0: Is the power of patience and gentleness?”
ai-ja283:2.1_0: “These are brahmins of the past, so lovely,
ai-ja283:3.3_0: venerated by the jackals and the lions,
ai-ja283:3.4_0: she is the path to greatness.”
